unnormalised: Borem, tumi integral calculus-ant budd marunk lagleat? Chintna korunk naka, tem dista titlem bhirankull nhõi! Tem differentiation-achem ul’ta dislem, jench tumkam aichem khobor asa. Differentiation funkshan-achem *bodlacho daar* sodunk asa, integral calculus funkshan-achem *sangrahan* sodunk asa. Konnacheakoddlean tumi kitlo door geleat tem tumcho ghottki meloun sodunk. Somzonk mellta, nhõi? Ame thoda udharonancher kam kortalim, tenchhem vachunk sodunk.
normalised: Boro, tumi integral calculus-ant dhukta? Chinta kor naka, tem dista titlem bhirankull nhoi! Tem differentiation-achem ulttem mhunn chint, jem tumkam adinch kolltta astolem. Differentiation-ant function-achi bodolpachi gati sodhun kaddpak ashta, integral calculus-ant tea function-achem ektrit sodhun kaddpak ashta. Konnakui ek khas kshannan tumchi gati polleun tumi kitlench ontor bhonvle mhunn sodhun kaddpa sarkhem. Orth asa, nhoi? Hem odik nirmoll korpak ami thoddim udahornnam korun polleuncheam.

unnormalised: Challa, aamhi basicsan-cher shuru kortalim. Tumi ∫ symbol dhaklo asa, nhõi? Tech integral sign asa. Aata, ∫ f(x) dx asa mantlear “x-ank sombondit f(x)-achanti antiderivative sodunk”. “dx” bhaag tumkam sangta tumi konnak sombondit integrate kortale. Tem dista “integrate f(x) relative to x”. Ugddas diunk, + C zai amhi dor eka integral-achea xevottak odta? Tech fact-ank odta jenva aami ek constant number-acho derivative kaddta tenva tem zero zata.
normalised: Chala, buniyadicam pasun survat koruya. Tumkam integralachem chin'h distolem, nhoi? Tem integral sign. Atam, integral f of x d x mhanllear buniyadic torancher "x-ache sandrbhan f of x-achem antiderivative sodhun kadd." "d x" bhag tumi koslea variable-ache sandrbhan integrate kortat tem sangta. Tem "x-chea sandrbhan f of x integrate kor" mhanllea sarkhem. Dor integral-achea xevttak ami plus C zoddttat tem ugddas dovrat? Tem mhunnllear ami eka sthir ankddyachem derivative kaddtta tedna tem shunya zata.

unnormalised: Aata, chintat tumi ek curve-achea khalachi area sodunk sodtale. Let’s say the curve is f(x) = x^2 ani tumi this curve-achea khalachi area x=1 thisan x=3 sodunk sodtale. Basically, tumi evaluate korunk sodtale: ∫ x^2 dx 1 than 3.
normalised: Atam, tumi eka curve-akhalchem shetr sodhun kaddpak yatn karta mhunn chintat. Chala mhunnuya curve f of x x-achi bargi ani tumkam hea curve-akhalchem shetr x ek pasun x tin meren sodhun kaddpak zai. Buniyadic torancher, tumkam mol sodhunk zai: integral x bargi d x ek pasun tin meren.

unnormalised: Poilim, integrate x^2 jench (x^3)/3 dista. Punn calculate kor: [(3^3)/3 ] - [(1^3)/3] = [27/3] - [1/3] = 26/3.
normalised: Poile, x bargi integrate korat zachi x kubacho ankddo tin-an bhag dita. Magir ganant: ughodd bracket tin kubacho ankddo tin-an bhag dita dhak bracket unnem ughodd bracket ek kubacho ankddo tin-an bhag dita dhak bracket ganant ughodd bracket sattees tin-an bhag dita dhak bracket unnem ughodd bracket ek tin-an bhag dita dhak bracket ganant sattees bhag dita tin.

unnormalised: Challa, aamhi dusren example kartalim. Let’s say tumi f(x)= x^3 + 2x acho integral sodunk sodtale. x^3 = (x^4)/4, acho integral ani 2x = x^2 acho integral. Thisan aamhi dita: ∫(x^3 + 2x) dx = (x^4)/4 + x^2 + C. Sopem asa, nhõi?
normalised: Ani ek udahornn korun polleuncheam. Mhunnuya tumkam f of x x kubacho ankddo plus don x-achem integral sodhunk zai. X kubachea ankddyachem integral x chovo powar char-an bhag dita, ani don x-achem integral x bargi. Dekhun ami lavunk zatat: integral ughodd bracket x kubacho ankddo plus don x dhak bracket d x x-acho powar char-ak char-an bhag dita plus x bargi plus C. Sope, nhoi?

unnormalised: Ek important application ek solid-achem volume sodunk asa. Tumkam surface area formulas such as 4πr^2 (ek sphere-acho surface area) va πrl + πr^2 (ek cone-acho surface area)calculate korunk khobor asa tench tumi integrals vaparunk zatai tem generalize korunk ani irregular objects-achem volumes calculate korunk.
normalised: Eka ghana volume sodhun kaddpak ek mukhel upyog asa. Tumi char pi r bargi (eka sphere-achem surface area) vo pi r l plus pi r bargi (eka cone-achem surface area) sarkhea formulyan surface area kashi ganant korchi tem tumkam kolltta zalear, tumi heam odhikrut korpak integrals vaprun irregular objectanche volume ganant korunk zatat.

unnormalised: NCERT textbook-antli problems practice kortat va Khan Academy-ak try kortat. Simple polynomials, trigonometric functions (like sin(x) and cos(x)), ani exponential functions (like e^x) sombhandhit problems sodrunk. ≈ 100 problems sodrunk pun tumi this topic-akoddlean bore zaunk zatai! Delhi-anthan tumche maths exams-ak soglea borem! Ugddas diunk: Practice makes perfect.
normalised: Tumchea N-C-E-R-T textbook-anche problems vo Khan Academy pasun korun polleat. Simple polynomials, trigonometric functions (sine of x ani cosine of x sarkhe), ani exponential functions (e to the power of x sarkhe) asloli problems sodvayat. Lagbhag ek xembhor problems sodvoilea uprant tumi hea vishayanche vixim odik aramdaik astoleat! Delhi pasun tumchea maths-achea porixamank subhechha! Ugddas dovrat: korun korun sarllem zata.
